properties.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains West; Southwest Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Cody Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; North Big Horn Basin
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 1:26PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service in Riverton.

* WHAT...Snow. Accumulations of 0.5 to 1.5 inches in the basin, 2
to 3 inches on the west side of the Bighorns. The higher
accumulations will occur southeast of a Worland-Thermopolis
line.

* WHERE...the Bighorn Basin and west side of the Bighorn
Mountains.

* WHEN...3 AM to 12 PM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The best chances for snow will be in the
morning. Temperatures are expected to rise above freezing by
midday, which will limit additional accumulation.

NWSheadline: Light to Moderate Snow returns Monday
